programme.title: Tagasi tulevikku
programme.desc: USA 1985 ulme/seikluskomoodia Lavastaja:Robert Zemeckis Osades: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson Dr. Emmett Brown leiutab autost ajamasina, millega ta saaks reisida tulevikku, kuid ool, mil ta seda imeparast leiutist katsetab lastakse Dr. Brown maha, temaga kaasas olnud 17-aastane Marty McFly põgeneb ajamasinaga Emmetti tapjate eest ja satub aastasse 1955, kus ta segab vahele oma vanemate kokkusaamisele ja Marty ema armub temasse.Nuud on ajalugu sassi loodud ning tal tuleb abistada George McFlyd, et ta saaks kokku Lorraine Bainesiga, sest muidu ei sunni Martyt.Muidugi pole lihtne tagasi 80-ndatesse tagasi poorduda, sest ajamasina tooks on vaja vaga võimast jõudu ja Marty peab abipalvega poorduma noore Dr. Emmett Browni poole. Marty ulesanded pole kerged, sest kaalul on tema enda elu.

programme.title: Tagasi tulevikku 2
programme.desc: USA 1989 ulme/seikluskomoodia Lavastaja:Robert Zemeckis Osades: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson Ülipopulaarse seiklustriloogia teine osa, kus Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) ja tema sõber Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd) uhke sportautoga ajas randavad. Sedapuhku satub Marty eksikombel aastasse 2015. Asjad võtavad aga ohtliku poorde, kui Marty ja teiste McFlyde vihavaenlane Biff Tannen varastab ajamasina, sõidab 1950ndatesse aastatesse ja annab iseendale teatmiku, kus kirjas kõik tulevaste aastate spordivõistluste tulemused. Seelabi saab tulevik sootuks teise nao - Biff on kõikvõimas miljonar, abielus Marty emaga ja tema idulliline kodukant on muutunud maapealseks põrguks. Õiglus ja kord tuleb taas jalule seada...

programme.title: Tahtede poole
programme.desc: Ulmedraama, mis kandideeris Veneetsia filmifestivalil Kuldlõvile. Filmi tegevus leiab aset lahitulevikus. Meie paikesesusteemi tabavad ohtlikud energiapursked, mis seavad inimkonna tuleviku kusimargi alla. Raudse enesekontrolliga kartmatu astronaut Roy McBride (Brad Pitt, "Ükskord Hollywoodis") saadetakse paikesesusteemi aarealadele, et ules otsida oma isa (Tommy Lee Jones, "Jalitatav"). Meest, kes aastate eest ulisalajase missiooni kaigus kadunuks jai, kahtlustatakse seoses Maad tabanud lookidega… Filmi lavastas James Gray ("Kadunud linn Z").

programme.title: Trollid
programme.desc: Printsess Popi ja Haru on olnud pikka aega sõbrad. Peaaegu sama pikalt on kainud nende vahel ettevaatlik flirt. Sellega on nuud kõik, sest need kaks trolli on nuud ametlikult paar! Tunnetekeerises oma valjavalitut paremini tundma õppides saab Popi teada, et Haru minevik peidab suurt saladust. Nimelt kuulus ta minevikus... pooraselt populaarsesse poistebandi BroZone! See pole veel kõik, pealekauba olid ulejaanud bandiliikmed Haru vennad, kellest ta seni sõnakestki poetanud pole! BroZone lagunes siis, kui Haru oli alles trollitita, habras oksake, ning sellest ajast pole ta teisi enam nainud. Kui aga uks vendadest, Floyd, kahe kuulsusejanus, aga tõsise talendipuudega superstaarihakatise poolt roovitakse, asuvad Haru ja Popi ohtlikule ja emotsionaalsele teekonnale, et vennad taas kokku tuua. Sest vaid nii saaks nad paasta uhe omade seast saatusest, mis veel hullem kui kuulsuse kadumine!

programme.title: Kaitseingel
programme.desc: Der Rettungsschwimmer Ben Randall hat sein gesamtes Team bei einem Einsatz verloren. Er erkennt, wie wichtig eine gute Ausbildung ist und wird Trainer fur Rettungsschwimmer. Bens harte Methoden sind bei seinen Schulern gefurchtet, besonders der arrogante Highschool-Schwimmstar Jake widersetzt sich. Doch Ben macht ihm klar, dass es nicht um Heldentum, sondern um das Retten von Menschenleben geht.

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: USA 2001 sõjafilm Lavastaja: Michael Bay Osades: Ben Affleck, Kate Beckinsale, Josh Hartnett, Cuba Gooding jr., Tom Sizemore, Jon Voight Unisel puhapaeva varahommikul taitus rahulik taevas Havai paradiisisaarte kohal sadade Jaapani murisevate sõjalennukitega, mis rundasid Pearl Harboris asuvat USA merevaebaasi. Ootamatu ja alatu õhurunnak lõpetas Ameerika Ühendriikide rahumeelse hoiaku Teise maailmasõja suhtes ning viis suurriigi halastamatusse sõtta. Jaapanlased aratasid end võitmatuks pidava magava hiiglase une pealt ja sõda saabus Ameerikasse. Runnakust vandatud suurejooneline sõjafilm keskendub saatuslikku paeva umbritsenud sundmustele ja sõjavapustustele, mille keskmes on kaks noort merevaelendurit -lapsepõlvesõbrad Rafe ja Danny - ning sõjavae-medõde Evelyn. Äkkrunnaku katastroofilised kaotused muudavad kõigi kohalolnute elu. Sellal kui end kiirelt koguv USA sõjavagi valmistub vasturunnakuks, võitlevad Rafe ja Danny Evelyni sudame parast.

programme.desc: Annalise ja Bonnie poorduvad abi saamiseks ootamatu allika poole, mis tekitab ta tudengite seas pingeid.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise saab vihje suudistaja Atwoodi kohta, mille tulemuseks on tuline vaidlus Nateiga.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda

programme.title: Kaitseingel on langenud
programme.desc: USA 2019 põnevusmarul. Mike Banning annab riigiteenistuses endast kõik. Tema peamine ulesanne on USA presidendi julgeoleku tagamine. Banning, pikka aega presidenti kaitsnud ning julgeolekususteemiga labi ja lõhki tuttav, ajab suurte terroriruhmituste kavatsused korduvalt luhta. Seekord on terroristid aga sepitsenud marksa nutikama plaani: targast salateenistuse agendist iga hinna eest vabaneda.Saanud terroristide kõige ohtlikumaks sihtmargiks, kirjutab Banning alla oma surmaotsusele: teda suudistatakse USA presidendi elu kallale kippumises. Vanad relvavennad ei usalda teda, sest kahtlustavad, et ta kavatseb presidendi tappa. Et paasta oma hea nimi ja eelkõige elu, peab Banning valja uurima, kes ja miks mangib tema ja presidendiga saatanlikku mangu. Agent oletab, et seekord on terroristidel plaan õhkida riigipea lennuk. Lavastaja:Ric Roman Waugh Osades:Gerard Butler, Lance Reddick, Morgan Freeman, Piper Perabo, Jada Pinkett-Smith, Nick Nolte, Tim Blake Nelson, Danny Huston

programme.title: Lennuplaan
programme.desc: USA 2005 põnevik Lavastaja: Robert Schwentke Osades: Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean, Kate Beahan, Michael Irby Kassahitist põnevusfilm Kylest (Jodie Foster), kes ilmselt ainukesena usub, et tema kuueaastane tutar astus koos temaga lennuki pardale, aga on nuud kadunud. Kyle sõidab koos oma tutrega Berliinist New Yorki. Masenduses oma mehe surmast, vajub Kyle mõttesse kuid toibununa markab, et tema tutar on kadunud. Keegi peale Kylei ei taha uskuda, et laps uldse pardale tuli. Ema on murest hullumas kuid peab uksi selle mõistatuse lahendama ja tutre paastma, maksku see, mis maksab.

programme.title: Guinness Six Nations
programme.desc: The Six Nations Championship is an annual international mens rugby union competition between the rugby teams of England, France, Ireland, Italy, Scotland, and Wales. Its format is quite simple: each team plays every other team once making a total of 15 matches, with home ground advantage alternating from one year to the next. The current champions are England, who won the 2020 tournament.

LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Meistrite liiga
programme.desc: The UEFA Champions League is the most prestigious club competition in the world. From the early qualifying rounds to the latter stages of the knockout phase, this is the pinnacle of European football. From giants such as thirteen-time holders Real Madrid, to minnows making their first appearance in UEFA competition, we have a host of different stories to tell and a whole new season, to tell them. Liverpool Football Club are the reigning champions in this competition and alongside the likes of Chelsea, Tottenham and Manchester City, they are flying the flag for English teams in this seasons instalment. With this seasons final in Istanbul, who will engrave their name onto the trophy this year? We hope to answer this question, with our original coverage and in-depth analysis.

programme.title: UFC
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Turkish Airlines EuroLeague
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

From the early qualifying rounds to the latter stages of the knockout phase, this is the pinnacle of European football. From giants such as thirteen-time holders Real Madrid, to minnows making their first appearance in UEFA competition, we have a host of different stories to tell and a whole new season, to tell them. Liverpool Football Club are the reigning champions in this competition and alongside the likes of Chelsea, Tottenham and Manchester City, they are flying the flag for English teams in this seasons instalment. With this seasons final in Istanbul, who will engrave their name onto the trophy this year? We hope to answer this question, with our original coverage and in-depth analysis.

Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Divided By Design
programme.desc: Eilyn and Ray must finish their forever home before their housewarming party, and after three years, Eilyn reveals her luxury reno in the Keys.

programme.title: Breaking New Ground

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Vacation House for Free is a reality TV show hosted by Matt Blashaw, real estate expert and licensed contractor with fantastic handyman skills he gained while working at his fathers lumberyard through college. Matt makes dreams come true for those who want to buy a vacation house and be mortgage free, he teaches them how to use rental income to cover the costs of owning it. Matt finds a property at a right price, renovates it and places it on the rental market. So his clients can get income when not living there and by doing so they get it for free.

Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.sub-title: A Family Home In Dayton, Ohio
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Muistsete tulnukate eriesitlus
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud on juba ammu vaitnud, et Maa on maavaline laboratoorium. Kas see hõlmab sel juhul lisaks inimestele ka loomi? Üle maailma võib leida teateid loom-jumalate kohta, mis kummalisel moel peegeldavad kohtumisi tulnukatega.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Üle kogu maailma on keelatud "kolmnurgad" - salaparased piirkonnad, kuhu sisenevad laevad, lennukid ja inimesed, mis seejarel lihtsalt kaovad. Kas need kohad trotsivad fuusikaseadusi? Või on Maal tõesti mõned kohad, kuhu me lihtsalt ei tohi minna?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi on vaga huvitatud oma brandi laiendamisest San Bernardinos. Rene on kindel, et kõik tahavad teda katte saada. Dusty jahib laoboksi, mis on tolmusem kui ta ise. Kenny aga on omadega rabas.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Lisa naaseb Moreno Valleysse, kus kõik algas, ja nostalgitseb oma laoboksi juures. Kenny tervitab klanni uut lapselast ja tahaks leida sobiva laoboksi. Dusty ja Lupe lisavad oma ostule pisut higi ja vaeva.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui Muoni andmed teatasid põnevast sihtmargist Aladdini koopana tuntud õõnsuses, kus on leitud suuri kulla ja hõbeda jalgi, avastab meeskond nailiselt inimese loodud sisse- ja valjapaasud sellesse kummalisse koopasse.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy võtab Stantonis endale jarelevalverolli ja see juhib ta vaiksele slaavi edule. Brandi uritab aidata Danielleil oma uut korterit sisustada. Lisa panustab maalile.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Dusty ja Lupe sõidavad Fullertonis toimuvale oksjonile, kuid vajavad lõpuks veoautot. Darrell paneb oma lootused vaikesele laoboksile, mille eest ta ule maksis. Rene võtab maksimumi "mesinadalate laoboksist" ja asjad lahevad veidi tormakaks.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Taas Montebellos, tuleb Gunter "appi" Renele, kes ei anna talle selleks aega. Darrell uritab Kimberit oma kuningannaks teha, samal ajal kui Ivy ja ta poisid teevad Rochambeau moel teed uhke pakkumiseni.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi krahmab West Covinas endale korraliku maatuki ja see tasub end kenasti ara. Rene ei suuda vastu panna hea seifi saladusele. Kenny ei suuda oma nalga rahuldada, samal ajal kui Barry kasutab võimalust, et konkurentide tagant napata.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Arst on... Riversideis. Rene võtab suurelt ette. Ivy leiab asjadest pungil laoboksi ja komistab ebatavalise paritoluga antiikesemete peale. Darrell haarab vaiksema boksi, kuid avastab, et head asjad on mõnikord tõepoolest vaikestes pakendites.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Paljude arvates on maiad Ameerika ajaloo vagevaim tsivilisatsioon, mis õitses enam kui 2000 aastat. Nuud on avastatud uusi tõendeid, mis muudavad taielikult meie arusaama sellest iidsest kultuurist.

programme.title: Muistsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teooria usku Giorgio Tsoukalos jagab mõtteid hiiglaslike kivimoodustiste ja kummaliste hiidkujude kohta, mida tuntakse monoliitidena. Mis sundis iidseid inimesi ule maailma hiiglaslikke kive liigutama ja kivimonumente ehitama?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Corey tõttavad uurima 1968. aasta kabrioletti. Kas labiraakimised kulgevad kahku või põiklevad nad halva tehingu eest kõrvale? Siis tulevad mangu kondid, kui Chum jahib tukikest oreodonti fossiili. Aga kas ta saab dinosaurusliku hinna?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Renel on Stantonis kasumit jahtides leiged tulemused. Dusty leiab hunniku kvaliteetset varustust, kinkides endale korraliku palgapaeva. Aardeid otsides saab Brandi siiski kaed roheliseks... lihtsalt mitte nii, nagu ta ootas.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Kõik suured tegijad tulevad Fullertoni suurele oksjonile... või vahemalt seda kuuleb Barry, kui ta võtab Dusty oma tiiva alla, et naha, millist kasumit ta suudab teenida. Rene teeb mõned hõrgud avastused, samas kui Darrelli boks on usna silmiavav.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Üle kogu maailma on keelatud "kolmnurgad" - salaparased piirkonnad, kuhu sisenevad laevad, lennukid ja inimesed, mis seejarel lihtsalt kaovad. Kas need kohad trotsivad fuusikaseadusi? Või on Maal tõesti mõned kohad, kuhu me lihtsalt ei tohi minna?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Corey tõttavad uurima 1968. aasta kabrioletti. Kas labiraakimised kulgevad kahku või põiklevad nad halva tehingu eest kõrvale? Siis tulevad mangu kondid, kui Chum jahib tukikest oreodonti fossiili. Aga kas ta saab dinosaurusliku hinna?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen ostavad elektriauto, kuid kuna akud puuduvad, on kallis remont nende ainus võimalus kasu teenida. Kas kodune pruulimissusteem ja tipptasemel õhupussid aitavad looki pehmendada või toovad need hoopis palju kahjumit?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Poisid saavad saagiks kohandatud driftiauto ja luksuslike antiikesemetega uksuse, kus võib olla ainulaadne I maailmasõja piloodipustol. Puudes relva paritolu jalile saada, jatab Toni juhtjalg nad automuugiga hatta.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natasha riskib kasumi ja ajaga, kui signaalid ristuvad massiivse raadiotorni mõõtmetega, samal ajal kui Dwight ja Tyesha kardavad tagajargi parast seda, kui superkangelaste kujud nende valve all ruustatakse.

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Bill Morani sepakoolis pannakse kolm parimat seppa ulimale proovile. Parast kahte julma katsumust saab ainult uks neist võimaluse võistelda peaauhinna eest.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Kenny suundub magedesse, olles kogu aeg valvel puumade suhtes. Lisa teenib kasumit vaikese õe laoboksiga, kuid nadala ostja nominatsiooni saab Brandi.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy roovib Popsi ja viib ta Rosamondi, kus nad hangivad osavalt suureparase laoboksi. Kenny asub kõiki lõbustama ja tema naljatamine lõpeb tahtede nagemisega. Lisa tõestab, et tal on sõber... esialgu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.sub-title: Kui sul on see olemas, anna minna
programme.desc: Kenny satub tuttavale sõidukile ja jargneb sellele kuni Lancasteri oksjonini, kus ta puuab meeleheitlikult leida bensiiniraha. Rene uritab leida uut õnne parast kaotust Vegases.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Asutajad Isad lõid USA vabaduse ja demokraatia alustalad. Sajandeid hiljem ilmnevad uued paljastused nende keerukuse, eesmarkide ja varjatud tõdede kohta. Millised saladused peituvad Ameerika kujundanud meeste taga?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui Muoni andmed teatasid põnevast sihtmargist Aladdini koopana tuntud õõnsuses, kus on leitud suuri kulla ja hõbeda jalgi, avastab meeskond nailiselt inimese loodud sisse- ja valjapaasud sellesse kummalisse koopasse.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Talismanid pakuvad kaitset ja õnne. Mõne puhul arvatakse isegi, et need kehastavad kõrgemat jõudu. Kas võib olla, et see, mis toidab meie usku talismanidesse, ei ole ebausk, vaid tõeline side millegagi valjaspool meie maailma?

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja lahingud varvides
programme.desc: Hammastavad, asja varvitud lahingu- ja kroonikakaadrid ning isiklikud malestused viivad meid lahingu sudamesse, mis andis mõlemale poolele katastroofilise loogi ja jattis ule kogu Ida-Belgia mudase kalmistu.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kõige suurem mõistatus, millele puudub seni vastus, võib olla meie saatus parast surma. Ehk annavad vihjeid ebaharilikud surmalahedased juhtumid.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Hiiglaslik animatrooniline olend, kellel on uhepaevane tahtaeg, tekitab Mollyle ja Russellile õudusunenagusid, samal ajal kui Tamara unistab magusast palgapaevast, viies ulisuure veinitunni riigi teise otsa.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Kaubad, mida traditsioonilised toovõtjad transportida ei suuda, ei ole selle tõsielusaate osalejatele takistuseks. Veokijuhid võistlevad omavahel, kes saab jagu suurimast valjakutsest – toimetada kõige keerulisem veos punktist A punkti B. Pole vahet, kas see kaalub mitu tonni, võtab enda alla mitu liiklusrada, mureneb, puruneb või on elus! Kõige olulisem on kliendi rahulolu ja teenuse kiirus.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Kaubad, mida traditsioonilised toovõtjad transportida ei suuda, ei ole selle tõsielusaate osalejatele takistuseks. Veokijuhid võistlevad omavahel, kes saab jagu suurimast valjakutsest – toimetada kõige keerulisem veos punktist A punkti B. Pole vahet, kas see kaalub mitu tonni, võtab enda alla mitu liiklusrada, mureneb, puruneb või on elus! Kõige olulisem on kliendi rahulolu ja teenuse kiirus.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick võitleb paari vanaaegse plakati parast, kuid kas ta võidab selle sõja? Seejarel kutsuvad Rick ja Chum appi Grayskulli, kui nad vaatavad ule suurt Battle Cati manguasja. Kas paar saab šoki kõrgest hinnast või suudab labiraakimised umber poorata?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kui Rick ja Marty lõpuks sel aastal esimest korda aiašahtis maa alla satuvad, võib neid eksitada iidne puunis.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Sari "Iidsed tulnukad" on uurinud maailma vanimaid ja kõige uskumatumaid jaanuseid lahedalt ja isiklikult. Nuud heidab Giorgio Tsoukalos taas pilgu kõige salaparasematele artefaktidele ule kogu maailma.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rosamondis on naisi rohkem kui mehi, sest Dusty ja ta sõbranna avastavad vanu telereliikviaid. Danielle ja Lisa aitavad Brandil kulda kaevata ja see, mida nad leiavad, sunnib pausile. Kenny komistab millelgi, mis naib olevat eksootiline meloodiakarp.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Lancaster on Ivy meepott, nii et kõigil on parem olla ettevaatlik, sest muidu võivad nad nõelata saada. Lisa plaanib boksi valimisel kasutada oma paremat ajupoolkera... või hoopis vasakut? Samal ajal, kui Dusty ja Tolliputka Lupe korraldavad mitzvah.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy võtab Stantonis endale jarelevalverolli ja see juhib ta vaiksele slaavi edule. Brandi uritab aidata Danielleil oma uut korterit sisustada. Lisa panustab maalile.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Dusty ja Lupe sõidavad Fullertonis toimuvale oksjonile, kuid vajavad lõpuks veoautot. Darrell paneb oma lootused vaikesele laoboksile, mille eest ta ule maksis. Rene võtab maksimumi "mesinadalate laoboksist" ja asjad lahevad veidi tormakaks.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Talismanid pakuvad kaitset ja õnne. Mõne puhul arvatakse isegi, et need kehastavad kõrgemat jõudu. Kas võib olla, et see, mis toidab meie usku talismanidesse, ei ole ebausk, vaid tõeline side millegagi valjaspool meie maailma?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: On lugusid arenenud iidsetest tehnoloogiatest, mis tunduvad liiga võimatuna, et olla tõsi. Neist raagitakse legendides ja muutides. Kas meie tipptasemel kaasaegne tehnoloogia on vaid taasleiutatud tuhandeid aastaid tagasi eksisteerinud tehnoloogiia?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Paljude arvates on maiad Ameerika ajaloo vagevaim tsivilisatsioon, mis õitses enam kui 2000 aastat. Nuud on avastatud uusi tõendeid, mis muudavad taielikult meie arusaama sellest iidsest kultuurist.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Aastaid on inimesed leidnud võimalusi surnute matmiseks. Hauad, hauakambrid, tuhastamised - kõik need pakuvad viimast puhkepaika. Kuid kas on võimalik, et mõned neist tavadest suudavad hinge igavesti sailitada? Või isegi surnuid uuesti ellu aratada?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Asutajad Isad lõid USA vabaduse ja demokraatia alustalad. Sajandeid hiljem ilmnevad uued paljastused nende keerukuse, eesmarkide ja varjatud tõdede kohta. Millised saladused peituvad Ameerika kujundanud meeste taga?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Kaubad, mida traditsioonilised toovõtjad transportida ei suuda, ei ole selle tõsielusaate osalejatele takistuseks. Veokijuhid võistlevad omavahel, kes saab jagu suurimast valjakutsest – toimetada kõige keerulisem veos punktist A punkti B. Pole vahet, kas see kaalub mitu tonni, võtab enda alla mitu liiklusrada, mureneb, puruneb või on elus! Kõige olulisem on kliendi rahulolu ja teenuse kiirus.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Kaubad, mida traditsioonilised toovõtjad transportida ei suuda, ei ole selle tõsielusaate osalejatele takistuseks. Veokijuhid võistlevad omavahel, kes saab jagu suurimast valjakutsest – toimetada kõige keerulisem veos punktist A punkti B. Pole vahet, kas see kaalub mitu tonni, võtab enda alla mitu liiklusrada, mureneb, puruneb või on elus! Kõige olulisem on kliendi rahulolu ja teenuse kiirus.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rosamondis on naisi rohkem kui mehi, sest Dusty ja ta sõbranna avastavad vanu telereliikviaid. Danielle ja Lisa aitavad Brandil kulda kaevata ja see, mida nad leiavad, sunnib pausile. Kenny komistab millelgi, mis naib olevat eksootiline meloodiakarp.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Lancaster on Ivy meepott, nii et kõigil on parem olla ettevaatlik, sest muidu võivad nad nõelata saada. Lisa plaanib boksi valimisel kasutada oma paremat ajupoolkera... või hoopis vasakut? Samal ajal, kui Dusty ja Tolliputka Lupe korraldavad mitzvah.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy viib oma lapsed Victorvillei "rannapaevale" ja nad võtavad sellest maksimumi. Brandi uritab kustutada halbu telkimismalestusi hea laoboksi abil. Hoolimata sellest, et Rene hurjutab teda ta valikute tõttu, õnnestub Kennyl saada korralik tulu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laura viibib omaette Moreno Valleys ja ta pole selle põhjuste osas eriti salatsev. Brandi teenib kena kasumi. Rene nukukapist leiab paar ullatust, samas kui Ivy tegeleb pisut uleloomulike asjadega.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy ja Pops ostavad Fullertonis kotte, kuid lõpetavad konteineritega. Darrell ja Kimber panevad kõik mangu mangukapi eest, samas kui Brandi katab oma kulud muidu tagasihoidliku majapidamisboksiga.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Ameerika piirialad on tais legende kauboidest, indiaanlastest ja lindpriidest. Ent on ka palju õudseid lugusid neetud magedest, koletistest ja isegi UFOdest. Kas need jutud võivad olla tõsi? Kas Metsik Laas on palju veidram, kui tavaliselt arvatakse?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Parast seda, kui Muoni andmed teatasid põnevast sihtmargist Aladdini koopana tuntud õõnsuses, kus on leitud suuri kulla ja hõbeda jalgi, avastab meeskond nailiselt inimese loodud sisse- ja valjapaasud sellesse kummalisse koopasse.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Talismanid pakuvad kaitset ja õnne. Mõne puhul arvatakse isegi, et need kehastavad kõrgemat jõudu. Kas võib olla, et see, mis toidab meie usku talismanidesse, ei ole ebausk, vaid tõeline side millegagi valjaspool meie maailma?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Paljude arvates on maiad Ameerika ajaloo vagevaim tsivilisatsioon, mis õitses enam kui 2000 aastat. Nuud on avastatud uusi tõendeid, mis muudavad taielikult meie arusaama sellest iidsest kultuurist.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Sajandeid on see Atlandi ookeani piirkond olnud kõige kurikuulsam ookeanilõik Maal. Laevad, lennukid ja pahaaimamatud reisijad on siin jaljetult kadunud. Mis võib põhjustada nii palju salaparaseid kadumisi Bermuda kolmnurgas?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Molly ja Russel pannakse arcade-bowling-mangu muuja poolt oma saatmisnõuetega paika, samal ajal kui Tamara filmikujude vedu Minnesota suurimasse kommipoodi kuumeneb leegitseva kõrvallaadungi tõttu ule.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Dwight ja Tyesha komistavad animatroonilise turannosauruse otsa ja hakkavad seda tukeldama, samal ajal kui Doug haukab liialt suure suutaie, kui ta liigutab hiiglaslikku tagahoovis asuvat piraadilaeva stiilis mangumaja.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natashale teeb nalja klassikaliste põrkeautode vedu, kuid kas see atraktsioon jaab ta laeval terveks? Vahepeal laheb Tamara minigolfi vedu vett vedama, kui 12-osaline alglast muutub 100-osaliseks koormaks.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui Rick võtab sihikule 19. sajandist parit vintpussi, siis kas ta tabab tehinguga marki või laseb mooda? Muuja uritab painutada hinda Arnold Schwarzeneggeri autogrammiga autobiograafiaga. Kas Rick toob kulla koju või lõpetatakse tema pakkumine?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kui Rick ja Marty lõpuks sel aastal esimest korda aiašahtis maa alla satuvad, võib neid eksitada iidne puunis.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Paljud meie planeedi mõistatused on siiani lahendamata. Kuidas moodustus Devils Toweri kalju? Või miks tabab valk mõnda inimest mitu korda? Kuigi mõned peavad neid vaid juhusteks, kas ei või need pigem viidata hoopis uuele arusaamale?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: 20. sajandi alguses vaitis Edgar, et sai transis olles nagemusi minevikust ja tulevikust, ta tervendas haigeid ja vaidetavalt oli tal kohtumisi maavaliste olenditega. Kas võib olla, et ta oli anum, mida kasutati tulnukate kavade elluviimiseks?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Taas Montebellos, tuleb Gunter "appi" Renele, kes ei anna talle selleks aega. Darrell uritab Kimberit oma kuningannaks teha, samal ajal kui Ivy ja ta poisid teevad Rochambeau moel teed uhke pakkumiseni.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Kenny suundub magedesse, olles kogu aeg valvel puumade suhtes. Lisa teenib kasumit vaikese õe laoboksiga, kuid nadala ostja nominatsiooni saab Brandi.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Uuringud on naidanud, et kuni 70% kõigist UFO-de nagemisest toimub nn "lemmikpaikades", kus on regulaarselt teateid nagemuste, salaparaste tulede ja ebatavaliste nahtuste kohta - ja seda mitte ainult tanapaeval, vaid juba tuhandeid aastaid tagasi.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas foto UFO-st, mis hõljub Hollomani lennuvaebaasi kohal New Mexicos, on kinnitus, et president Eisenhoweril oli seal ulisalajane kohtumine tulnukatega? Kust lahtub Briti Columbias Witsetis salvestatud hirmuaratav ulgumine?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Mis on see salaparane objekt, mida lennukipiloodid on filminud 10 km kõrgusel Pakistani kohal lennates? Kas Jaapani uurimislaev jaadvustas kaadrid legendaarsest vaala meenutavast humanoid-veeolendist, keda tuntakse Ningeni nime all?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas video kummalisest varelevatest tuledest koosnevast moodustisest on viimane tõend, et Houston on UFOde lemmikpaik? Kes on see kaameraga jaadvustatud salaparane humanoidne olend? Kas valitsus tabati sõjavaebaasis tulnukate tehnikat transportimast?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Ameerika piirialad on tais legende kauboidest, indiaanlastest ja lindpriidest. Ent on ka palju õudseid lugusid neetud magedest, koletistest ja isegi UFOdest. Kas need jutud võivad olla tõsi? Kas Metsik Laas on palju veidram, kui tavaliselt arvatakse?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui Rick võtab sihikule 19. sajandist parit vintpussi, siis kas ta tabab tehinguga marki või laseb mooda? Muuja uritab painutada hinda Arnold Schwarzeneggeri autogrammiga autobiograafiaga. Kas Rick toob kulla koju või lõpetatakse tema pakkumine?

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: Kui Douglas Latchfordi suudistatakse Kambodža tapavaljadelt varastatud mitmemiljonilise roovsaagi omastamises, seisavad muuseumid ja kollektsionaarid silmitsi karmi tõsiasjaga, et nende valduses on varastatud vara.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Mis siis saab, kui Neptuuni-suurune rõngastega planeet võtab suuna Maa poole? See lõpeb nelja tunni jooksul taieliku havinguga.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Some of Americas most important historical and cultural treasures have been lost or stolen from famous museums, government archives and private collections. Host Brad Meltzer sets out to find a number of these precious artifacts, such as George Washingtons teeth, Apollo 11 moon landing tapes, ground zero flag from the September 11 attacks, Hitlers personal photo albums, and more. Brad is also soliciting tips from the audience, and offering a money reward.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi journeys in to the Five Chambers with the fellows in tow. Together they will document the ancient graffiti on the walls of the Chambers, proving Zahis theory that ancient Egyptians, not slaves, built the Pyramids at Giza.

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: Michael Steinhardt, suurim antiikesemete erakoguja, on sunnitud loovutama 70 miljoni dollari vaartuses varastatud saaki ja tal keelatakse kogumine. Steinhardti allakaik saabub parast nelja-aastast uurimist, mida tuntakse operatsioonina "Demetra".

programme.title: Deep Purple - Rock Review
programme.desc: This is the independent review of the music that changed the face of rock music forever. Featuring new in-depth interviews with original founder member Nicky Simper and Purple Mark III stalwart Glenn Hughes the film draws on rare footage of Purple in concert, in the studio and on the road. Also featured is behind the scenes footage of the band on tour in 1974, the first television appearances by the Mark II line up and a rare glimpse of the original Mark I line up in performance. We also hear the views of Jon Lord, Ritchie Blackmore, Iain Paice, Ian Gillan and David Coverdale.

programme.title: Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood - Live from Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: History rocked and rock made history during a sold-out three-gig stand at Madison Square Garden in late February 2008 when icons Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood performed a concert together for the first time since their all-too-brief days in the legendary Blind Faith in 1969. Whether they will ever team again is unknown. But with Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood Live From Madison Square Garden fans everywhere are able to experience the sound and the glory of a performance on that famous stage by two of rocks greatest artists.

programme.title: Ben Howard - Live at the Launch Pad
programme.desc: Ben Howard works through a dramatic set in Austin TX, starting humble and concluding in a cataclysmic storm of drums, snapping guitar strings, and a delirious crowd taking it all in.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Foo Fighters _ Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Faith No More - Live at Coachella
programme.desc: The Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival is an annual music and arts festival held at the Empire Polo Club in Indio, California, in the Coachella Valley.

programme.title: Deep Purple - Rock Review
programme.desc: This is the independent review of the music that changed the face of rock music forever. Featuring new in-depth interviews with original founder member Nicky Simper and Purple Mark III stalwart Glenn Hughes the film draws on rare footage of Purple in concert, in the studio and on the road. programme.title: Paul Rodgers - Free Spirit
programme.desc: The 16-song collection, Free Spirit, filmed in London, England returned Paul Rodgers to his roots, bringing fans an extraordinary evening celebrating the music of Free.

programme.title: The Black Keys - Live at Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: The Offspring - Rock AM
programme.desc: The Offspring is an American rock band from Garden Grove, California, formed in 1984. Originally formed under the name Manic Subsidal, the bands lineup consists of lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist Bryan "Dexter" Holland, bassist Todd Morse and lead guitarist Kevin "Noodles" Wasserman.

programme.title: Blondie - Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Blondie performs her hits including Heart of Glass", "Euphoria", Mile High" and many more…

programme.title: The Strokes - Live at Landmark Music Festival
programme.desc: And as with other hugely successful rock bands, it was the lead singer who was in charge of pumping up the crowd, with Julian Casablancas yelling things like "D.C., lets rock!" and "Whats up, D.C.?!" The crowd went wild, but to Casablancas, it was clearly a joke. He was playing a role and said as much outright at the beginning of the show, but that didnt stop the crowd, hungry for more entertainment, from taking him seriously.

programme.title: X Ambassadors - A Garage Gig
programme.desc: X Ambassadors slam through a heroic offering of power and emotion in this intense new Garage Gig.

Featuring new in-depth interviews with original founder member Nicky Simper and Purple Mark III stalwart Glenn Hughes the film draws on rare footage of Purple in concert, in the studio and on the road. Also featured is behind the scenes footage of the band on tour in 1974, the first television appearances by the Mark II line up and a rare glimpse of the original Mark I line up in performance. We also hear the views of Jon Lord, Ritchie Blackmore, Iain Paice, Ian Gillan and David Coverdale.

programme.title: David Gilmour - Remember That Night
programme.desc: David Gilmour - Remember That Night: Live at the Royal Albert Hall is recorded by guitarist David Gilmour where he presents live tracks from the album On an Island and some hits from his former band Pink Floyd.

programme.title: Beyonce - Sound of Change
programme.desc: The Sound Of Change was a benefit concert held at Twickenham Stadium, London, England, as part of the Chime For Change initiative, founded by Beyonce with the help of actress Salma Hayek and Guccis creative director, Frida Giannini.

programme.title: Adele
programme.sub-title: Adele: iTunes Festival - Live in London
programme.desc: Fans at the iTunes Festival: London 2011 were blown away with the performance of English singer-songwriter Adele. This concert was recorded live on stage at The Roundhouse in London, United Kingdom, where Adele gave one of the best shows of her career with her unique voice.

programme.title: Rodrigo y Gabriela - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The mexican duet takes the stage at Garorock Festival, in July 2014.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Janis Joplin was one of the most successful and widely-known female rock stars of her era. After releasing three albums, she died of a heroin overdose at the age of 27. Her fourth album, Pearl, was released in January 1971, just over three months after her death. It reached number one on the Billboard charts. Her Legacy. The big-voiced, bluesy singer dominated the stage, forged her own path and paved the way for the female singers who followed.

programme.title: The Grateful Dead - Classic Albums
programme.sub-title: The Grateful Dead - Classic Albums: Anthem To Beauty
programme.desc: This installment of the Classic Albums series follows the making of two Grateful Dead albums, the fiercely experimental Anthem of the Sun and the understated masterwork American Beauty, which spawned melodic gems like "Sugar Magnolia" and "Ripple." Between the archival scenes and contemporary interviews with band members, the program shows a band making seismic in roads in pop music and five young guys coming to terms with artistry, mortality, and, yes, the pursuit of happiness. There is priceless footage of Neal Cassady driving Ken Keseys bus and of the Dead, surrounded by martini sipping hipsters, on Playboy After Dark. The best scenes involve band members talking about specific songs (you will never hear Phil Leshs "Box of Rain" again without thinking of it as a gift to his dying father) or deconstructing a tune by playing each track separately. Intimate and surprisingly cohesive, Anthem to Beauty is a rare glimpse into how the Deads magic was made.

programme.title: Hozier - Live at Coachella
programme.desc: The Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival is an annual music and arts festival held at the Empire Polo Club in Indio, California, in the Coachella Valley

programme.title: Beck - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Kaleo - In Session
programme.desc: Kaleo hail from Iceland, but you wouldnt know it by the fits Southern voodoo hiding in this unexpected session.

programme.title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti
programme.sub-title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti: A Classic Album Under Review
programme.desc: This is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums. With the aid of rare and classic performances, scarce interviews, seldom seen photographs and contributions from those involved in the making of the record - plus the review and critique from a panel of Zeppelin experts - this program finally lifts the lid on what many believe to be Led Zeps very finest offering. With contributions from; the albums engineer, Ron Nevison; former Yardbird, Chris Dreja; Swansong recording artist, Maggie Bell; author of The Rough Guide to Led Zeppelin, Nigel Williamson; Tight But Loose editor, Dave Lewis; Classic Rock Magazines Malcolm Dome; renowned guitar tutor and author, Rikky Rooksby and Robert Plant biographer, Neil Daniels. This is the complete story behind what what Rolling Stone called "their Tommy, Beggars Banquet and Sgt. Pepper rolled into one".

programme.title: Of Monsters and Men - Main Square Festival 2013
programme.desc: The Icelandic band Of Monsters and Men perform a fun and entertaining set in sunny Arras, France. The folk story-tellers hit all the right notes!

programme.title: Childish Gambino - Live at Rockwood Music Hall
programme.desc: Its been a crazy year for Donald Glover, but nothing has been more blazing than his career as rapper Childish Gambino. The project, born of a Wu-Tang name generator, is full of witty, rambunctious energy, as he effortlessly demonstrates in his session at Rockwood Music Hall. Along with collaborator and musical guru Ludwig Gransson on electric guitar, Gambino rips through tracks from his wildly popular EP as well as the lead single from his debut album Camp (out now on Glassnote Records). From introspection to love to pop culture and punny metaphors, Gambino runs an impressive lyrical gammit, one that inspires all the vital decision making organs.

programme.title: Alice Cooper - Welcome To My Nightmare
programme.desc: This special edition documentary feature from Alice Cooper includes the 1976 concert film "Welcome To My Nightmare" and, releasing for the first time, the 1975 TV special "Alice Cooper: The Nightmare". "Alice Cooper: The Nightmare" is the rarely seen 1975 TV special that aired on ABC, in conjunction with the release of the legendary "Welcome To My Nightmare" album. The TV special stars Alice Cooper as Steven and Vincent Price as The Spirit of the Nightmare, and showcases every song from the "Welcome To My Nightmare" album, including Only Women Bleed, Department of Youth, Cold Ethyl and the title track. "Welcome To My Nightmare" features hits and classic songs, including Im Eighteen, School s Out, Only Women Bleed, No More Mr. Nice Guy and, of course, Welcome To My Nightmare. The nightmare vividly comes to life on the rock stage, bringing forth a plethora of skeletons, giant spiders, a cyclops, the "magic" movie screen and the voice of horrormeister Vincent Price, all designed to thrill you and keep you uneasy in your sleep.

programme.title: Enrique Iglesias _ Live from Odyssey Arena
programme.desc: Filmed at Odyssey Arena, Belfast, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Enrique Iglesias featuring unforgettable version of his hits: ""Bailamos"", ""Hero"", ""Be With You"" and many more….

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Birmingham in the late 1960s was an industrial city, packed with music groups. At its height, the New Musical Express had reported 500 on its bustling circuit and from two of these groups, Black Sabbath was formed. The Beatles would be a key influence for Ozzy, but bassist Geezer Butler also shaped Ozzys work, through his lyrics After signing to Vertigo Records in 1970, the four piece used their distinctive sound to full effect for their self-titled debut album, Black Sabbath. Black Sabbath became a commercial success, entering the UK top 10 and the US charts. In its first year it sold one million copies. Keen to build on the success, the band entered the studio just four months after releasing their debut. The title track, Paranoid, would lead the new album. Featuring archive material, music videos "PARANOID" "EVIL WOMAN" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.title: Kurjuse haal
programme.desc: In 1983, the Secret Service trails a counterfeiter. The audio recordings they find of him torturing women reveal one of history`s most depraved serial killers.

programme.title: The Lake Erie Murders
programme.desc: Coming from the beautiful environs of Lake Erie, straddling the border between the US and Canada, this true life crime show focuses on the more sinister and gruesome tales of some of the regions darkest and deadliest crimes. We explore baffling and mysterious murder cases such as that of the 1989 kidnapping and murder of 10-year-old Amy Mihaljevic which provoked much speculation and intrigue in the area and which is still an open case. Each hourlong episode delves into the case history, analyzes the facts and evidence and carefully examines the detection procedures and how each suspect was cleared of suspicion. Subsequent episodes detail four additional deadly crimes that were solved by local law enforcement.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: True Conviction crime series is based on homicide cases from real life. The series explores how these cases are solved on the street and won in the courtroom. It is hosted by Anna-Sigga Nicolazzi, a decorated Brooklyn prosecutor who has never lost a murder case. She travels across the country to check how the nations top prosecutors handle their toughest cases and meets with other key figures in the cases, including loved ones and investigators.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: In 2017, an Ohio couple finds a dismembered body in a basement freezer. It unlocks a harrowing mystery surrounding a missing woman and a tragic love triangle.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: True crime documentary series examining the troubling task law enforcement officers have, as they scour murder crime scenes for potential clues and evidence that will help them identify the culprit. With dramatic reconstructions that paint a picture of the brutal killing, each episode focusses on a respective case, as detectives scramble to catch the killer. Every potential item of evidence is pieced together, hoping to complete the sinister puzzle and bring justice for the family and friends of the deceased. As they uncover more about the victims, the detectives learn of their dark and mysterious secrets.

programme.title: Perfektne mõrv
programme.desc: This team of detectives are determined to detain the dangerous killers that they are faced with. What may initially seem like the "perfect murder" requires a great depth of investigation and dedication, but eventually the detectives crack them open and reveal the truth. The key to their success is their great level of persistence, and imaginative investigative skills. Dead ends wont deter the team, when a seemingly impossible case lands on their desks, they always find a way in the end.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: Mõrva kõned
programme.desc: Murder Calls is a true-crime documentary series that explores the importance of the 911 calls made to the emergency services. Each episode features the chilling calls themselves, as detectives and investigators use the given information to help them track, trace and identify the potential killers. Using extensive reenactments, Murder Calls recreates aspects of the haunting murders, showing the twists and turns detectives face as they aim to understand the motive and identify the culprits. As with many murder cases, nothing at first is what it seems.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.sub-title: You Know What Time It Is
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.sub-title: The Murders At Immaculate Auto Sales
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Following Roo Powell, a 38-year-old child advocate, and her team at non-profit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) as they conduct an undercover operation to identify and stop adult predators who use the internet to harm the most vulnerable. With the help of her team, Roo transforms into a teen to reveal the identities of the men who reach out to her.

programme.title: Truth About Murder With Sunny Hostin
programme.desc: Host, and former federal prosecutor, Sunny Hostin (from The View) takes us on an investigative journey to uncover the true stories of crime victims and their loved ones. Unlike most crime shows which focus on the motives or backstory of the killers, this show exposes the real, deadly impact on those who suffer at the hands of the perpetrator. The stories of everyday people who get caught up in these heinous crimes often go unheard and it is equally important that these individuals get to tell their stories as it is for us to hear them. Sunny also interviews the detectives, prosecutors, coroners, and others involved to piece together the truth of each case. With an intention to be socially inclusive, the show highlights stories concerning people of color, women and the LGBTQ community.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: To catch a killer, you have to think like a killer. In this true-crime documentary series, a team of dedicated experts led by detective Mike Arntfield attempt to solve murder cases that have gone cold, bringing closure to victims families. By re-enacting the crimes, uncovering new evidence, talking with friends and family members, and using 21st century technology, the team of passionate investigators hunt down every lead in order to solve the case.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.sub-title: He Said There Were More Of Them
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Juhtumit uurib Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: Feuds Turned Fatal
programme.desc: Two men start an auto body repair business, but a bitter feud erupts, and one man goes missing with indisputable evidence of a brutal murder.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace
programme.desc: Now re-aged as an adult and living alone, Natalia wreaks havoc by stalking her new neighbours. Plus, the Barnetts dark side emerges as they face investigation.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace
programme.desc: The Barnetts, now divorced, abandon Natalia in an apartment in Indiana. When the police get involved, Michaels shocking confessions lead to their arrests.
